tickets.subject: Unable to reset password
tickets.description: I've tried to reset my password multiple times but the reset link doesn't work. When I click it, I get an error saying the link is invalid or expired.

tickets.subject: Application freezes frequently
tickets.description: The application freezes every 10-15 minutes and I have to restart it. This is making it very difficult to get work done.

tickets.subject: Incorrect billing amount
tickets.description: My credit card was charged $199 but my plan should only be $149 per month. Please review and refund the difference.

tickets.subject: Request: Add calendar integration
tickets.description: It would be extremely helpful if you could add integration with Google Calendar so we can sync our schedules automatically.

tickets.subject: Bug: Dashboard widgets not updating
tickets.description: The dashboard widgets show stale data. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open dashboard 2. Make changes in another section 3. Return to dashboard 4. Data hasn't updated. Expected: Dashboard should show current data.

tickets.subject: Critical: Cannot access account
tickets.description: I urgently need to access my account for an important presentation but I'm completely locked out. This is blocking my work.

tickets.subject: Error 403 when uploading files
tickets.description: Every time I try to upload a file I get a 403 Forbidden error. I've tried different file types and sizes but same result.

tickets.subject: Need invoice for last 3 months
tickets.description: I need invoices for the last 3 months for our accounting department. Can you send them to this email?

tickets.subject: Suggestion: Dark theme
tickets.description: I use the app late at night and the bright white theme hurts my eyes. A dark theme option would be much appreciated.

tickets.subject: Defect: Filters reset on page reload
tickets.description: When I set filters on the list page and then reload the browser, all filters are reset. Steps to reproduce: 1. Set filters 2. Reload page 3. Filters are gone. Expected: Filters should persist across page reloads.

tickets.subject: 2FA authentication failing
tickets.description: The two-factor authentication codes from my authenticator app are being rejected as invalid. I can't login to my account.

tickets.subject: Slow response times
tickets.description: The application has been very slow lately. Simple operations that used to take seconds now take minutes. This is affecting our team's productivity.

tickets.subject: Upgrade plan pricing
tickets.description: I'm interested in upgrading to the premium plan. What's the pricing and what additional features do I get?

tickets.subject: Feature: Bulk export
tickets.description: We need the ability to export all our data in bulk rather than having to export one item at a time. This would save us hours of work.

tickets.subject: Regression: Search broken after update
tickets.description: After the latest update, the search function is completely broken. It returns no results for any query. This was working fine before the update. Steps to reproduce: 1. Enter any search term 2. Click search 3. No results returned even for data that definitely exists.

tickets.subject: Account verification email not received
tickets.description: I signed up for an account but never received the verification email. I've checked spam folder and tried resending multiple times.

tickets.subject: Connection errors
tickets.description: I'm getting frequent connection errors and timeouts. The error message says 'Failed to connect to server'. This happens several times per hour.

tickets.subject: Payment declined but account charged
tickets.description: My payment was declined according to the app, but my bank shows the charge went through. Now I can't use the service and I've been charged.

tickets.subject: Enhancement: Mobile app needed
tickets.description: The mobile web version is difficult to use. A native mobile app would greatly improve the user experience for mobile users.

tickets.subject: Bug: Incorrect date display
tickets.description: Dates are displaying in the wrong format and timezone. All dates are showing as one day earlier than they should be. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create item with today's date 2. View item 3. Date shows as yesterday. Expected: Date should match what was entered.

tickets.subject: Can't login to my account
tickets.description: I've been locked out of my account after entering wrong password too many times

tickets.subject: Production system is down
tickets.description: Critical issue - our production environment is completely down and customers cannot access the service

tickets.subject: Refund for double charge
tickets.description: I was charged twice for my subscription this month. Please process a refund for the duplicate payment
